content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a slightly higher proposal than what you might expect, knowing my character. I suggest a monthly rent of 1150 Euros. Now it's your turn to negotiate and try to lower this amount for your benefit. Remember, only focus on the rental price in our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your proposal, Herr Schmidt. However, I believe we can find a more suitable price for both parties. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I propose 900 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my primary goal is to secure the highest possible rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello again, Herr Schmidt. I understand your position, but let's continue the negotiation. I propose a price of 950 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Still unwilling to meet my expectations but a slight improvement. I don't see any reason to proceed lower than 1050 Euros monthly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. I am willing to increase my offer. How about 1000 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While appreciating your flexibility, I remain firm on obtaining at least 1050 Euros as rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your consistency, Herr Schmidt. Let's split the difference. How about 1025 Euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Agreeing to split the difference shows your compromise. I accept the price of 1025 Euros for the monthly rent! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
